INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT(FILE_NO, REF_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_LEVEL) VALUES(SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL, SEQ_RPNO.CURRVAL, ?, ?, ?, 3)

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT REPORT_NO, REPORT_TITLE, REPORT_CONTENT, REASON, REPORT_DATE, R.STATUS, m2.USER_ID AS REPORTED_USER, m1.USER_ID AS REPORT_USER FROM REPORT R JOIN MEMBER m1 ON (R.REPORT_USER= m1.USER_NO) JOIN MEMBER m2 ON (R.REPORTED_USER= m2.USER_NO) ORDER BY REPORT_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM REPORT
UPDATE REPORT SET STATUS = 'Y' WHERE REPORT_NO = ?
SELECT FILE_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE FILE_LEVEL = 3
